description.en:
The newest work by the author of [Torako! Don't Break Everything!](https://mangadex.org/title/20425/)  
  
Modern day mystery! Puzzles! An Otherworldly Mystery!  
  
<This is a story of modest friendships and farewells over many strange things–>  
  
The rejuvenation mystery "Tsukiyomi's Water of Life."  
“Otherworldly poems” that should never be read.  
A book you don't know will be on your bookshelf before you know it, "The Droplifted Book."  
"A Tale of a Mystic Soldier"…  
  
Something is happening in this town, at the central station in the Tokyo metropolitan area…  
The last remaining mystery of the "modern-day mystery" in the age of Heisei, is about to be solved.  
The duo of an aspiring novelist, Ogawa Sumireko, and a child-faced, thread-eyed demonic boy, Ren Adashino, take on the challenge!  
What is required is a combination of occult knowledge and physical strength!  
What awaits them as they try to solve the numerous mysteries in this town?  
  
A mysterious, violent, action and erotic modern-day bizarre Romanesque!
